post_text: June 8, 2015 at 9:06 AM#1Hello all,I am looking for the syntax to edit a macro line directly from the command line without going through the macro edit window.This is in the manual:Assign Macro 1.3.4 /wait=GoSets the triggertime of line 4 of macro 3 to "Go"What is the syntax to change the content of the line rather than the trigger time?Thanks!

posts.post_text: June 18, 2015 at 2:43 PM#2assign macro 1.macronumber.linenumber/cmd="your input"extracting the text already in the cmd is not possible so far I know.In the future you can learn much of this commands in the root directory.(TUI)try to browse the root directory with the changedest function.In the root the same command will looks like thisassign root macros.global.macro number.line number/cmd="your text"or with numbers: assign root 12.1.macronumber.linenumber/cmd="your text"I hope this is usefull info for you
